name: Hit360
description:
Want a fun but challenging casual game?
Hit360 is the right game for you.

Hit360 features:
Single touch control.
Addictive game play

How to play Hit360:
Your goal is to keep hitting bars as the same colour as your ball as long as possible. You can rotate clockwise and anti clockwise by tapping/left clicking mouse.
Difficult but an extremely addictive casual game.

The game is available on google play.
